divs: sighting detailsi was leaving early in morning to go to my oldest daughters, she was going to have my 2nd grandchild. so i was driving on back roads to get to main highway since i live in the country. it was about 0430 in the morning when i observed a round large glowing light orange\white in color with blinking lights. there was an airplane flying much higher past the object, i was able to use it as a comparison to see that it wasn't an airplane, it looked nothing like the plane. while watching i then observed a smaller object\craft of the same color drop out of the larger object. it stopped just above the tree tops. both objects just hovered in the area they were first seen. then they both disappeared, i called my mother to tell her, she was up because she was seeing us off. my youngest daughter was with me during this time. i was definatly anxious and conflicted, i wanted to get as far away as possible but at the same time i wanted to watch.when i was on the phone with my mother the large main object appeared again without the secondary craft, it was only there briefly then it disappeared for good. i always watch the skys because approx. 3 yrs earlier my oldest daughter her fianc��� and i witnessed another ufo and took pics however my youngest daughter was using my digital camera and erased them needless to say i was pretty upset. the ufo i am reporting now was in the same area in the sky as the one we saw 3 yrs earlier.
Summary: large orange/white ball about 3to 4 football fields in sky,after observing for 2 mins a smaller same color craft came out. went straight down just above tee top and hovered then they both disappeared. i have more info but not enough space here to share it
